text: Water Shrine

A strong spirit leads
the way to the troubled
waters that lie ahead.

Stay above water, and
you will conquer the
evil Agwanda.

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
At last, you got a map!
Press the SELECT 
Button to look at it!

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
You've got the Plank
treasure!

I am Agwanda, and this
is my realm! I control
the Waters of Life and

Renewal. I will dry up
even your tears, little
one!

text:
I am the North Kelpie!
It is my honor to fight

you for my mistress,
the great Agwanda!

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
I am Agwanda. I dam up
the streams. I draw the
water underground.

I gather up even the
droplets of dew and
deny them to my

enemies. You are
trespassing here!

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Debug flag set to open doors on touch

text:
I am the South Kelpie,
guardian of the whirl-
pool that lies beyond!

At last, you got a 
compass! You can use it
to warp to the shrine

entrance anywhere on 
the world map. Find it
on the status screen.

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
I know you've come to
steal the Water of
Life! You shall not have

it while I have
substance to fill my
form. Begone!

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
I'm the East Kelpie!
I bar the way to my

mistress, the
wonderful Agwanda!

You think you have
beaten me, but water

takes many shapes,
and I'll be back!

args.text: Debug flag set to open doors on touch
Debug flag set to open doors on touch
Player has left room without collecting the heart container. Make it available if they change their mind.

text:
You have overcome
great trials, but evil
still looms over Tolemac.

Stay true to your 
journey, for it will bring
you closer to young

Link, who lies captive to
Ganon. I hear tell of a
vast fortress of

strength and power. Go
forward bravely, and
you will be victorious.
